name: 作業系統
description:
This course will introduce the core concepts of operating systems, such as processes and threads, scheduling, synchronization, memory management, file systems, and input and output device management. The course will consist of assigned reading, weekly lectures, a midterm and final exam, and a sequence of homework assignments. 

本課程介紹與作業系統有關的核心概念，包括進程和線程、排程、同步、記憶體管理、檔案系統、輸入和輸出設備的管理。本課程的學習內容包含指定閱讀，每週講課，期中考和期末考以及一系列的相關作業。
goals: 了解各式作業系統類型和特色
學習硬體像是CPU、記憶體等與I/O運作之間的溝通和Interrupt處理
運用不同演算法來對處理程序(process)做優化像是concurrent processes、scheduling等
了解作業系統不同的記憶體管理方法對於存取資料從Database的影響
深入分析不同作業系統的特色和性能
從早期的微核心作業系統、分散式作業系統到現今的嵌入式即時作業系統來了解相關科技之進展
syllabus:
The course covers the classical internal algorithms and structures of operating systems, including CPU scheduling, memory management, and device management. Considers the unifying concept of the operating system as a collection of cooperating sequential processes. Covers topics including file systems, virtual memory, disk request scheduling, concurrent processes, deadlocks, security, and integrity.
